name: Yandex.Disk Bot
description: This bot integrates Yandex.Disk right into Telegram.

commands.description: Upload a photo. Original name will be not saved, quality of photo will be decreased. Send photo(s) with this command
Upload a file. Original name will be saved. For photos, original quality will be saved. Send file(s) with this command
Upload an audio. Original name will be saved, original type may be changed. Send audio file(s) with this command
Upload a video. Original name will be not saved, original type may be changed. Send video file(s) with this command
Upload a voice. Send voice file(s) with this command
Create a folder. Send folder name with this command. Folder name should starts from root, nested folders should be separated with backslash character
Give me an access to your Yandex.Disk
Revoke my access to your Yandex.Disk
